library(tidyverse)

dat <- read_csv("https://covid.ourworldindata.org/data/owid-covid-data.csv")
# object_size(dat)
view(dat)

dat <- read_csv("datasets/insurance.csv")

n_distinct(dat$region)
count(dat$region)
table(dat$region) 

dat %>% 
    group_by(region) %>% 
    summarise(
        Count = n(), 
        Mean = mean(bmi), 
        Sum = sum(charges) %>% round()
        )

dat %>% 
    group_by(region, smoker) %>% 
    summarise(
        Count = n(), 
        Mean = mean(bmi), 
        Sum = sum(charges) %>% round()
        )
